summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Bridge Rehabilitation and Replacement project; and authorizing the Director of the Department of Transportation to acquire, accept, and record, on behalf of the City of Seattle, a permanent Maintenance Easement from SPO, LLC, a Washington limited liability company (SPO), for the purpose of inspecting, maintaining, cleaning, repairing, and replacing a wall supporting the north approach of the Airport Way South Viaduct (Viaduct) in connection with the Airport Way South Viaduct Over Argo Railroad Yard project.
